title: The Game
creator: Jack London
description: LibriVox recording of The Game by Jack London. Read by Tom Crawford. Jack London wrote at least four stories about boxing; A Piece of Steak (1909), The Mexican (1911), The Abysmal Brute (1911), and The Game (1905). The Game is told, in part, from the point of view of a woman, the fiancée of one of the competitors. This is to be his last fight and they are to be married on the morrow. Against her better judgment, she agrees to watch the bout. (Introduction by Tom Crawford) For more free audio books, or to become a volunteer reader, please visit LibriVox.org. M4B format available
subject: librivox; audio; novel; boxing; london
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text
